Question: Jiaxing Jinlida Electron Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Jiaxing Jinlida Electron Co., Ltd.

Car Audio Speaker

- Steel Frame
- Bandpass design
- Midrange speaker suitable for car audio systems

Pro Audio Cable

- Manufacturer of Speaker Cable, Power Cable, RCA Cable, Amplifier Kits
- Specialized in Monitoring Cable, Alarm Cable, Video Cable, Lan Cable, CAT5, CAT5E
- ISO 9001:2015 quality management system, ROHS and CE certified

JLD Audio, also known as Jiaxing Jinlida Electron Co., Ltd., is a professional manufacturer of Pro/Stage Audio and Car Audio products. With over 15 years of experience, they offer customized products tailored to customer specifications. Their car audio speakers feature a steel frame, bandpass design, and midrange speaker suitable for car audio systems. In addition, they specialize in manufacturing a wide range of pro audio cables including speaker, power, RCA, and amplifier kits, as well as monitoring, alarm, video, and LAN cables. JLD Audio is ISO 9001:2015, ROHS, and CE certified, ensuring strict quality control and qualified products.
